sentences.sContent: He accepted the job, albeit with some hesitation.
sentences.sCn: 尽管有些犹豫，他还是接受了那份工作。

sentences.sContent: Chris went with her, albeit reluctantly.
sentences.sCn: 尽管勉强，克里斯还是同她一起去了。

trans.tranOther: used to add information that reduces the force or importance of what you have just said
